plant.title: Sago Palm
plant.summary: Every part is highly toxic to cats‚Äîseeds (nuts) are most deadly. Even a single seed can cause severe liver failure, seizures, and death within 24‚Äì48 hours.
plant.what_to_do:
**üö® THIS IS A LIFE-THREATENING EMERGENCY. ACT NOW.**

1. **Call your emergency vet IMMEDIATELY‚Äîeven if no symptoms appear.**
2. Contact the **ASPCA Animal Poison Control Center** at **(888) 426-4435**.
3. **Do NOT wait.** Survival depends on treatment within **2‚Äì6 hours**.
4. If possible, bring a sample of the plant or seed.

> üí° Warning: Often sold as ornamental houseplants or in landscaping; many owners don‚Äôt realize how deadly they are.
